events.name: BDA BRUNCH
events.description: The BDA is offering a Summer Brunch, to help you recover from yesterday and get today off to a good start! You can also watch a movie at the MDE.

events.name: BDS AFTERNOON
events.description: The BDS invites you to an afternoon of sport! On the program: beach volleyball, Spikeball, ping pong, ultimate... All you need to know about ITM's flagship sports!

events.name: CINEMINES
events.description: The BDA film club is screening a film at the MDE, as it does every Sunday evening! Popcorn is available, so bring your ecocup.
